SEC (Self Employed Calculator)

A simple script for the website Autoentrepreneur.fr, that calculates your income limit at the date of status declaration. I didn't pushed it on GitHub because it's a private project, only for this website, but you can use use it without modifying or distributing it. It's here (in french), in a box in the sidebar, "Votre chiffre d'affaire autoris√©".
Stage: Released
